lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I have learned from my travels to the developing world that the people who have the least are usually the ones who give the most. I have been moved by their generosity, and I hope to repay a small fraction of the kindness that they have extended to me.
lender.occupational_info: I lead a team of computer programmers

lender.name: Margaret S
lender.loan_because: We're so rich, they're so poor. It's not fair.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Grades 2 and 3 (seven and eight years old) in a school in the country by a forest. There are usually about 22 kids in my class.

lender.name: Chloe
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: After people buy my company's product, I help them with any questions, concerns, or comments they may have.

lender.name: Brad
lender.occupational_info: I design agricultural equipment.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I can, and every little bit helps!
lender.occupational_info: I write manuals that describe how to use computer programs.

lender.name: Edd
lender.occupational_info: I work as a crisis intervention counselor and work with people that are referred by the police and other community services. I provide brief therapy and mental health assessment for individuals in crisis situations

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with so much.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student.

lender.name: Pam
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from FedEx and can spend my time as a volunteer. I work with 2nd graders in Charlotte, North Carolina helping them improve their reading skills.

lender.name: Toglia
lender.loan_because: I want to help enterprising people.

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: as hard as it is for me to make it, there is always somebody else that needs it more than me
lender.occupational_info: I build communities on the internet

lender.name: Marie
lender.occupational_info: child welfare services

lender.name: The Sales Family
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help in some small way

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: To assist families to make a better life for themselves and their children. We are all in this together!
lender.occupational_info: I look after the accounts & the staff welfare side of our business.

lender.name: Michele
lender.occupational_info: Teaching, writing arrangements, performing. I travel internationally teaching and performing.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: It does good for this world.

lender.name: Karen
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non profit organization supporting Canadians with low vision and blindness.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: I feel we are all in this life together and it is nice to share and help each other. I like to call it The Art of Accompaniment..
lender.occupational_info: I have opened a beautiful international tea room supporting the culture of tea...which for me is the art of conversation.

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone can use a helping hand from time to time.

lender.name: Kate&John
lender.occupational_info: Make educational and entertaining shows and documentaries

lender.name: Ian
lender.occupational_info: A learning experience

lender.name: Abby
lender.loan_because: It is a way to help people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am homeschooled and I workout 30 hours a week for gymnastics.

lender.name: Wyatt
lender.loan_because: I think that giving people a chance in necessary
lender.occupational_info: I am a student, and I am interested in foreign culture

lender.name: Allen
lender.loan_because: it feels right
lender.occupational_info: i teach high school children ages 14-18

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: We are all brothers & sisters around the world. I want to encourage you in your work.
lender.occupational_info: Before I retired, I worked with handicapped children and their families.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: Microlending is the most effective and economically efficient way for me to make a difference in the life of someone doing worthwhile work in their community that needs my help to keep doing it, across the globe.

lender.name: Shanda
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to spread the word of Jesus Christ.
lender.occupational_info: I clean teeth and love my job because I can help people become healthier individuals.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I hope to help others achieve a better standard of living.

lender.name: Eliot
lender.loan_because: I am committed to helping end poverty and fight social injustice.

lender.name: Madge
lender.loan_because: I don't need all of my money as much as someone across the world would need it
lender.occupational_info: I am learning about how computers work and also how to design buildings so they won't fall over.

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: I loan because I love, I would prefer to just give.
lender.occupational_info: I am a doer of Gods' work.

lender.name: Nora
lender.loan_because: my children and I decided that we would like to contribute to something that reminded us of how privileged a life we lead. We feel it is important for all of us to give rather than always think about the getting!

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: It is the only way I can help to improve the lives of others around the world and to try to provide opportunities to others that we have had the privileged to be born into here in Canada.

lender.name: Julia Jolliff
lender.loan_because: I feel that this is one of the best ways to make an impact in a developing country. I think that it is a long term solution to poverty. Offering these individuals or groups loans is helping them to create a sense of community and provide education and food for their families. The best part is when the loan is repaid I can recycle it into a new loan for another person!!
lender.occupational_info: I do fundraising for a HealthCare organization. We raise money for programs from Cancer Care to Adult Down Syndrome. I work on the government relations team.

lender.name: Pilar
lender.loan_because: at this time, I have the ability to help someone monetarily. I have the basics, maybe a bit more. So why not help out? Who knows when the wind will blow in the other direction.
lender.occupational_info: I schedule repair work for customers that need their equipment fixed, or installed, or maintained.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: It is a privilege.

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: When I give, I give myself -Walt Whitman

lender.name: Kirk
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing for me to do

lender.name: Laura
lender.occupational_info: I study land planning around human needs and environmental systems.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I was able to begin my business thru a traditional bank loan in the US, and feel that I want to return the favor to someone less fortunate than me in a poor country
lender.occupational_info: I manufacture children's garments in Asia, Peru and Central America

lender.name: Ishaque
lender.loan_because: I Care

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I care!

lender.name: Shahrzad
lender.loan_because: We all do better when we all do better.

lender.name: Elisa
lender.loan_because: I would like to encourage hope of improving one's living conditions through a small contribution. By hard work and determination, one can realize the dream of small business to support themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I just took early retirement as financial administrator after 37 years of working. I have provided volunteer work for charitable organizations and my retirement enable me to spend more time on that cause.

lender.name: Mary Ann & Ja
lender.loan_because: others are in need.
lender.occupational_info: Ja and I work together on the night shift doing data entry. We are doing this for Christmas.

lender.name: Tim McCormack
lender.loan_because: People sometimes need a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: I attend Northeastern University in Boston, Massachusetts, USA. I am working towards a Computer Science degree, and I hope to one day work with research scientists.

lender.name: Deane
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Diana
lender.occupational_info: I work with grade 7 to grade 12 students needing assistance in their school work.

lender.name: Ani
lender.loan_because: I believe in "giving" and "helping" the ones who truly deserve. Kiva provides direct access and associates a "face" to the donation.

lender.name: victoria
lender.loan_because: i care
lender.occupational_info: i like making differences

lender.name: Emily and Travis
lender.loan_because: We all need to help one another!
lender.occupational_info: We own a creative firm that specializes in multi channel marketing and animation.

lender.name: Vicki & Mason
lender.loan_because: I am very blessed and want to help others to accomplish their goals.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I design cooling fans for motor vehicles.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I have received help in my life when I needed it...so I want to help in return.

lender.name: Art
lender.loan_because: I like to help folks help themselves. A hand up is always better than a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: Retired.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I believe in others who want to further their lives through productivity.
lender.occupational_info: Teaching special needs students has changed dramatically. Our students are in the same classes as their peers. We provide educational services unique to their various needs. Their ages are 11-13 years old. My nickname for them...our cherubs.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: Its Grate to help people to make their lives better

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: it is a way to repay all those who have helped me.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to adult immigrants and foreign visitors.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the delivery and distribution of music in digital formats to online retailers like iTunes and Beatport.com for a number of independent record labels

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: my nephews, brother and sister-in-law love me.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: It Works.
lender.occupational_info: Political Science

lender.name: Joe Green
lender.loan_because: I want to extend the opportunities that have been blessed upon my life.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: It is one of the best ways to improve a region in need of development. Sending a huge government cheque to upset the local economy and drive non-sponsored people out of business has never worked.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and learn.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: Wealth should be shared, no matter how much you have.

lender.name: Billy
lender.loan_because: someone needs to borrow

lender.name: Aaron
lender.occupational_info: peace keeper

lender.name: Vegard
lender.loan_because: it's helping people who actually need it, and tries to do something to make their lives better.

lender.name: Cristina
lender.loan_because: its the right thing to do is to help.
lender.occupational_info: I have an internet business

lender.name: Ulli
lender.loan_because: I am interested to see, how many invidudual projects around the world need loans. It¬¥s good to see, where the money helps people to expand or stabilize their business.

lender.name: emma
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to make the world a little bit better.

lender.name: Tannaz
lender.loan_because: i'd like to help people across the world accomplish their dreams
lender.occupational_info: Accounting for equity traders in Hong Kong

lender.name: Joakim
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: Everyone should.
lender.occupational_info: I promote programs abroad for American university students who want to work, volunteer, and teach all around the world.

lender.name: Zazie & Family
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs an opportunity.

lender.name: Kieran
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is a fantastic tool, when used in conjuction with many other aspects of development to improve poor people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student studying International Relations but I'm also working with SMDI to research for MFIs and about Microfinance in general. I'm hoping in the future I can pursue a career in development and microfinance.

lender.name: Ron & Co
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help people on their way, be involved and see direct results...
lender.occupational_info: I help large organizations make better use of information technology (computer, mobile phones and the internet)...

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: It seems like a great use of some of the money I earn.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to get people moving and playing!

lender.name: Corinne
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: the world will be a better place when people do not live in fear of hunger and when parents know that their children will live a better life.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: I want to pay forward the kindness my people showed when they adopted me!
lender.occupational_info: Best friend to my family.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I want to help people around the world.

lender.name: Heinz J. Kurt
lender.loan_because: for a fairer world
lender.occupational_info: Economic Security Delegate

lender.name: Nathaniel
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I am a cultural Ambassador of the US to Russia.

lender.name: Henrik
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people helping their selves.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs, so I am basically sitting at a desk with a computer all day long.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I want to help the next.

lender.name: Manuel
lender.loan_because: It is one of the best ways to generate wealth in this world
lender.occupational_info: Financial advisor

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to help people help themselves - thanks to Kiva, there is an alternative to big banks and unreasonable interest rates.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I have a comfortable life, for which I am grateful. I can express that gratitude by helping make some else's life more comfortable.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school to become an accountant. Then I will be able to help businesses and people here keep their finances in order so they can become or remain sucessful.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: My family loves me.
lender.occupational_info: I help prepare students to give their lives away.

lender.name: Maria Cristina
lender.loan_because: I feel that in Western world we all have more than necessary. It is our duty to give a helping hand to those there are still in need. Often a minor amount of money taken out from our daily expenses could change the quality of life of another human being: why shouldn't we do this?
lender.occupational_info: I work as civil servant in an International Institution. Being a convinced European, I also feel that we must export the European social model to ther parts of the world.

lender.name: Susie and Al
lender.loan_because: To help those less fortunate than us.

lender.name: Mickey
lender.loan_because: .....I know it's the right thing to do. i have been so lucky in my life and I realize that. The opportunity to help others is a blessing in itself & it makes me happy to do so.
lender.occupational_info: Living the best way I know how while striving for continued growth....spiritually, emotionally, mentally, & physically

lender.name: Lisa och Anders
lender.loan_because: I believe in the idea that people helping other people is the best way to help.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: Someone gave me a chance and its important to pay it forward

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: A gift from another should be a gift to another

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I beleive in dreams and hard work.
lender.occupational_info: I assist in crunching numbers

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: This was a gift to me and I find the whole notion of this idea to be fascinating and wonderful- i hope it will be the gift that keeps on giving.

lender.name: Will and Zan
lender.loan_because: I want others to follow their passion
lender.occupational_info: designer

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: Isn't this what it's all about?

lender.name: Pontus
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva is a great way to give people opportunities to fulfill their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work within the pharmaceutical business.

lender.name: graham
lender.loan_because: i need to re-build my food store and buy some equipment and food stock to make a new image for my food store
lender.occupational_info: i'm selling food to college student in diponegoro university, but i also be a freelance writer for a magazines.

lender.name: Ms Sushi
lender.loan_because: the future needs to be brighter
lender.occupational_info: helping women, one at a time

lender.name: Mollie
lender.loan_because: I've been there and I would rather have my investments be something I believe in than buy stock in a company that is not working to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I design educational programs for children in a museum setting.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I feel that loaning to Kiva users is a great way to make a difference on a personal level.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in the 8th grade.

lender.name: Jake
lender.loan_because: I want people to get at least one chance at something they desire

lender.name: Ellen
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-governmental agency that matches children and caring adults in mentoring relationships.

lender.name: Maureen Cohen
lender.loan_because: Its the best way to make a positive impact on the World around us. I am grateful to the founders of KIVA for providing us with the simply opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I organize and manage real estate projects, particularly resort hotels. I help with the planning, design, branding and financing. My hat is off to all the KIVA borrowers who can make so much out of their loans. The world admires your spirit.

lender.name: Jeff & Joy
lender.loan_because: Together we all thrive.
lender.occupational_info: We help people to get the most from themselves...to overcome their fears and flourish.

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: I was invited
lender.occupational_info: I work for a university

lender.name: Kevin Mattingly
lender.loan_because: it's one of the most effective ways to reduce global poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Law student

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: My wife and I have three grown children (18, 20, and 26) and adopted a child 4 years ago. This little girl has inpired me to make the most of life and to reach out to others. Let's leave a world full of love for our children.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher who works with kids who have a difficult time in school. Away from work I love the outdoors: white water kayaking, mtn biking, backpacking, skiing.

lender.name: Marty
lender.occupational_info: Gospel street evangelist doing labor jobs and working with my older brother.

lender.name: laura
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good inside.
lender.occupational_info: i am into cosmetic sales. I retail cosmetics, skin care products, hair dye, and i also do consultations.

lender.name: Joey
lender.loan_because: I like helping people out and it makes me feel good that I know people are using my donation in a good way.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school everyday!

lender.name: Persia
lender.loan_because: I love. It is our moral responsibility to our fellow humans to help them in any way we are able.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I want women to have control over their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mosiac artist.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: I was given a lot of opportunities to succeed by a lot of amazing people. This is my chance to pass along that good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: I create websites like this one.

lender.name: Nersel
lender.loan_because: Giving is Good
lender.occupational_info: I work on the computer and talk to many people on the phone. I help clients find people for their open jobs and help job seekers find good jobs at big companies. I also own a jewelry business and write and sell children's picture books.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.occupational_info: I do art :)

lender.name: Rosminah
lender.loan_because: it's important to share where we can.
lender.occupational_info: Marketing of global collaborative software.

lender.name: Betsy & Rex
lender.loan_because: I love the spirit and commitment of the microcredit entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I teach geography, and I especially love the human side of geography and current world events.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: with great gifts comes great responsibility
lender.occupational_info: I facilitate the healing and growth of communities through preaching, teaching, and pastoral care
